ComicInfo.Title: "The Geldarians moving in has been great." [Tech Jacket Chapter 8 of 8]
ComicInfo.Summary: DINOSAURUS returns! Hellbent on righting what he sees as wrong in the world he comes face-to-face with Invincible and the result is devastating.
